title: Blood moon again.
body:
Can we get kayn added to blood moon
or more champs i know there is 10 free then you need to buy the others but its just a repeat of the same game mode that we had not long ago
and even then it got boring so fast

replies.body: I know, I feel the same. When it first came up, just looking at it being on the PBE (via S@20) I figured it would be boring. Played one match and yep, boring. It's got to be, in my opinion, the single worst game mode Riot has come up with to date.
